channel.title: ModIcon
channel.description: hi, i added a new owner crown, and it works when i yell cause i changed the <img=> for the yell but i cant seem to find where to change the icon for when i talk, not yell. it still shows the admin crown. where is the img located so i can change it to <img=4> cause its <img=2> right now.

item.title: ModIcon
item.dc:creator: @looted_y00 looted y00
item.description:
@looted_y00 wrote:

But if owner and admin shared a crown, then the admins would get the owner crown also.

Read full topic

item.title: ModIcon
item.dc:creator: @metal_k0 metal k0
item.description:
@metal_k0 wrote:

You should replace your old owner crown with your new one in your client’s cache.

Read full topic

item.title: ModIcon
item.dc:creator: @x5478 x5478
item.description:
@x5478 wrote:

when you are staff and you talk ingame… you have a crown by your name, the admin crown was shared with the owner crown so if you were a owner, when u talked, it would be the admin crown, so i added a owner crown, i want to know how to change the admin crown to the owner crown i added. so when the owner talks, it will be the owner crown, not the admin crown.

Read full topic

item.title: ModIcon
item.dc:creator: @igli igli
item.description:
@igli wrote:

I’m not 100% what you’r asking but check your player class.

Read full topic
